articles.title: As the Virus Rages, Some Are Convinced It’s Too Late to Stop It - The New York Times
articles.description: Coronavirus case counts are at record highs, yet many in states like Idaho are embracing a let-it-ride approach. One county with a hospital nearing capacity repealed its mask mandate.

articles.title: Covid Patients Show Key Immunity Gauge After Six Months in Study - msnNOW
articles.description: A crucial type of defensive blood cell persists for at least six months in people after Covid-19, even in those who had no symptoms, in a new study that may ease concern about waning immunity and its implications for a vaccine.
